SENT.plain: Ultrasound examination led to prenatal diagnosis of Klippel-TrÃ©naunay-Weber syndrome complicated by early fetal congestive heart failure
The postnatal course was complicated by the Kasabach-Merritt syndrome of thrombocytopenia due to platelet consumption within the haemangioma
There was need for neonatal cardiopulmonary resuscitation and limb amputation
